nodes.text: Emulsauce was a tangy sauce. Dex's Diner, a restaurant on the planet Coruscant, made their Gartro egg salad fresh daily with emulsauce. The salad was then used in their Gartro egg salad sandwiches.

Emulsauce was first mentioned in "Dining at Dex's," a 2009 Hyperspace-exclusive article which was written by Gregory Walker and formatted as an in-universe menu. Walker called emulsauce the Star Wars equivalent of mayonnaise in his StarWars.com blog.
